description: Aloo Chana is a flavorful and hearty dish made with potatoes, chickpeas, and a blend of aromatic spices. It's a popular vegetarian dish enjoyed in India and beyond, often served with rice or flatbread.
steps: Heat oil in a large skillet or pan over medium heat. Add chopped onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste and slit green chilies to the skillet. Sauté for a minute until fragrant.
Add chopped tomatoes to the skillet and cook until they turn mushy.
Add diced potatoes to the skillet along with turmeric powder, coriander powder, cumin powder, red chili powder, garam masala, and salt. Mix well to coat the potatoes with the spices.
Cover the skillet and let the potatoes cook for about 10 minutes, or until they are partially cooked.
Add cooked chickpeas to the skillet and mix well with the potatoes and spices.
Cover the skillet again and let the mixture cook for another 10-15 minutes, or until the potatoes are fully cooked and tender.
Once the potatoes are cooked, garnish with fresh coriander leaves.
Serve hot with rice or flatbread. Enjoy your delicious Aloo Chana!
